welcome.title: Welcome to TrainSmart AI!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour of the main features of the app.

dashboard.title: Your Training Path
dashboard.description: This is your main screen. Here you will see your training plan day by day. Complete them to advance!

actions.title: Main Actions
actions.description: From this button you can generate a new routine from scratch or go to the technique analysis tool. Give it a try!

feedback.title: Form Analysis
feedback.description: This option takes you to the tool to record your exercises and receive AI corrections. This ensures good technique!

log.title: Training Log
log.description: Here you can see a history of all your completed workouts and your progress over time.

games.title: Game Zone
games.description: Test your fitness knowledge and have fun with our educational games.

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.description: Have any questions? Click here to chat with our AI assistant at any time.

startWorkout.title: Start Your Workout
startWorkout.description: Click here to start the first day of your routine. Inside you will find more tips about the features!

end.title: You're Ready!
end.description: You now know the basics. It's time to start training. Let's go for it!

technique.title: View Technique
technique.description: Click here to search for a YouTube video on how to perform the exercise correctly.

formAnalysis.title: AI Form Analysis
formAnalysis.description: If an exercise has this icon, you can click it to add it to a list. Then, in the Form Analysis tool, you can record yourself for the AI to correct your technique.
